content:
Powerful explosions in Tatarstan - unknown drones have successfully impressed the Factory, where Shahmedi is collected, video with hunting staff has become popular on the Internet.

The French Jdam Airlines have proven efficiency again, as evidenced by the video from the occupier's camera.

A group of not very resourceful Russians proved their own visual example why in the war it is not necessary to glue in one place.

Meanwhile, SCO snipers destroy the enemy in Kherson region, and the 63rd ombre stopped Russian storming with one drone.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Junior Lieutenant Sergey Lipko and Senior Lieutenant Artem Golub.
title: Shahanedov's plant burns, drone ripped the Russian storm, French aircraft
description: The French Jdam Airlines have proven efficiency again, as evidenced by the video from the camera ...
author: Army Inform
